mapper.select: SELECT AA.* FROM T_TERMS as AA ORDER BY NUMBER ASC
SELECT TOP(1) USER_ID AS userId ,NECESSARY as necessary ,SELECTIVE as selective FROM T_TERMS_AGREE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT TOP(1) TEL AS tel ,NECESSARY as necessary ,SELECTIVE as selective FROM T_TERMS_AGREE WHERE TEL = #{tel}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_TERMS_AGREE ( TEL, USER_ID, NECESSARY, SELECTIVE, AGREE_DATE, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{tel}, #{userId}, #{necessary}, #{selective}, getdate(), #{version} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_TERMS_AGREE SET NECESSARY = #{necessary}, SELECTIVE = #{selective} WHERE TEL = #{tel} OR USER_ID = #{userId}
